original_title: Mama Told Me Not to Look Into the Sun
overview: Kamilla lives with her mother Gudrun in a remote winery. In addition to the agricultural work of the vineyard, Kamilla takes care of her mother, who is dependent on her help with every movement. When the mysterious Rocco appears, Kamilla hides him from the police and they begin a passionate affair.
title: Mama Told Me Not to Look Into the Sun
